project-basis: The media network is built on top of Wordpress and azure.  It is built for scalability.  We chose Wordpress because it is a proven technology and has a pretty decent mobile apps for the farmers to publish articles in case they want to publish on their phones.
project-challenges: I could not find a good source of how many of our different crops are imported.
project-future-plans: Expand our farmer partners and the crop charts.
project-purpose: First part is a blog network.  Everyday farmers contribute articles and guides about issues that farmers face.  In exchange we share our revenue with our farmers.  Our revenue would come from advertisements that are strategically placed on the site and with strategic ad partners.
project-inspiration: Create tools and media for farmers to grow more profitable farms.
project-lessons-learned: Arizona is really efficient at growing corn!  Big shocker since we grew up in Illinois.
project-accomplishments: Two polymer elements (Bing and Wikipedia) that can be easily used in a new project.

team.participant-bubble: I handled the coding and some of the design.
